title: Scientists solve mystery of a fish called Mary's 'virgin' birth

title_detail.value: Scientists solve mystery of a fish called Mary's 'virgin' birth

summary: A female stickleback fish, nick-named 'Mary,' has produced offspring from eggs that appear to have been fertilized while they were still inside her, according to scientists.

summary_detail.value: A female stickleback fish, nick-named 'Mary,' has produced offspring from eggs that appear to have been fertilized while they were still inside her, according to scientists.
